channel.title: Client issues with Torso , and Hat items
channel.description: well with a lot of these items when you equip them on my client they appear all fucked up and you can see your clothes underneath .. where would i go clientside to fix this issue i went through the models info in the classes and stoof. just cant figure out.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2008, 04:11:59 PM[/size][hr]gah pl0x

item.title: Client issues with Torso , and Hat items

item.description:
@joeyjuggalo wrote:

nah, i did the item.java shit just the stuff seems to small/big most likely small cuz it dont fit the dude right and you can see his default clothes underneath[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2008, 05:14:42 PM[/size][hr]Fixed it.

item.title: Client issues with Torso , and Hat items
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

its server side.

for body items, put the ids in body and platebody.

and for helmets, put it under hats and full helms
